quote.quotepara: Is there a built-in property for the current target's name, e.g., ${ant.target}? Seems logical but I can't find it in the manual.

body.para: No. You can access it thru a <script> though. --DD

<project> <script language="javascript"> name = self.getOwningTarget().getName(); self.getProject().setNewProperty("targetname", name); </script> <echo message="current target is '${targetname}'" /> </project>
